trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Norcross
There were no other sightings in Norcross on or around September 30th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi live off holcomb bridge rd in norcross, i was taking my morning walk on tuesday, 9\30 at 8:00 a.m. as i walked down holcomb bridge toward jimmy carter, i notice a very large dark grayish colored object moving very slow. when i first noticed it i was in the parking lot of the papa johns and blockbuster plaza. the object was over peachtree ind blvd and jimmy carter overpass heading toward duluth at a very slow speed. there's a lot of tall trees in this area so when it came into my view i was was little taken back and stop right then! i was trying to process the whole thing, was in the heck is that! i notice an airplane fly right over this gray colored object. i waited to the plane went over the object because i wanted to compare the size, the object was massive, huge! i couldn't believe it! just to make sure i wasn't seeing things, there was a young man walking toward me and i pointed to the sky and asked him "what's that"? he turned around and looked up and had no idea what it could be! it moved slow enough that by the time i reach the plaza where the chick-fil-a\i hop and movie theater is off peachtree pkwy (141)i notice it was further up in duluth area but it had sorted stop moving and was sitting just below the right side of the sun! i waited to see if it was going to start moving again, it slowly start moving again north on peachtree ind blvd. with the tall trees i lost sight of. i'm sure plenty of people had to see it, in possible not to! it was too "low" and moved so slow and with all the traffic on pib, i couldn't have been the only one. i hope other people who saw it would reported it! thank you!
Summary: HUGE DARK OBJECT OVER NORCROSS, GA
